Bitdefender Box 2

Published on 01 May 2019

Just two years ago, antivirus company Bitdefender went in a new direction with a hardware solution for smart home security. Its Box device was the first to market, but not the last, and has since been joined by a burgeoning crowd of competitors.

Acer Predator Orion 9000

Published on 20 Apr 2019

Announced in the middle of last year, but only now becoming available to buy in the UK. Acer’s Predator Orion 9000 made headlines thanks to its eye-catching design coupled with ultra-high-end components including processors with up to eighteen cores.

PC Specialist Vulcan S2

Published on 14 Apr 2019

This £1,394 machine is built around two key components: an Intel Core i7-9700 processor and an Nvidia GeForce RTX 2070 graphics card. You’ll need to buy it direct from PC Specialist.
